pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bibliometric and Co-Citation Analysis Tool // Tool for quantitative research in scientometrics and bibliometrics. It provides various routines for importing bibliographic data from SCOPUS (http://scopus.com) and Clarivate Analytics Web of Science (http://www.webofknowledge.com/) databases, performing bibliometric analysis and building data matrices for co- citation, coupling, scientific collaboration and co-word analysis.
